summary: Over 80% of Madagascar's animals and plants are found nowhere else on Earth. Discover what made Madagascar so different from the rest of the world, and how evolution ran wild there.
cast: David Attenborough|John Brown|Rainer Dolch|Jonathan Linus Fiely|Kevin Flay|Pam Fogg|Tim Fogg|Ian Gray|Emma Napper|Gavin Thurston
director: Stars: David Attenborough, John Brown, Rainer Dolch | See full cast & crew Â»
title: Madagascar
